subject: Attn: - Your Seized COVID-19 Relief Check
body:
INVESTIGATION FBI.WASHINGTON DC..
FBI HEADQUARTERS IN WASHINGTON, D.C.
J.EDGAR HOOVER BUILDING
935 PENNSYLVANIA AVENUE, NW
WASHINGTON, D.C. 20515-0001.
FBI MEMO.

HELLO,

One Mr. Jeffery Brooks, private parcel delivery agent under FedEx was
arrested by my officers stationed at the Ronald Reagan Washington National
Airport with an envelop that contain a bank certified check sum of
$250,000.00 USD issued by The Internal Revenue Service that is said to
belong to you as your unreleased May 20th, 2020 COVID-19 Economic Impact
Payment, please you have to come to the station at 935 Pennsylvania Avenue
NW, Washington, DC 20535, to sign for the release of the FedEx private
parcel delivery agent and also claim your released $250,000.00 May 20th,
2020 COVID-19 Economic Impact Payment check but if you can't come to the
station then get back to me and let me know and I will get an attorney to
sign on your behalf for the release of the delivery agent to enable him
complete the delivery of your check to your doorstep, your immediate
response is highly needed. Thank you!

Yours faithfully,

Mr. Christopher A Wray

FBI Director
FBI HEADQUARTERS IN WASHINGTON, D.C.
J.EDGAR HOOVER BUILDING
935 PENNSYLVANIA AVENUE, NW
WASHINGTON, D.C. 20515-0001.
FBI MEMO.

subject: Re: Attn: - Your Seized COVID-19 Relief Check
body:
Hello Mr. Wray,

Thank you for reaching out to me about this situation. I'm surprised to hear about the arrest of Mr. Jeffery Brooks and the check that is said to belong to me. 

I'm afraid I won't be able to come down to the station in person due to my current circumstances. Could you please provide more information on how an attorney can sign on my behalf? Also, could you tell me more about this Economic Impact Payment check? I wasn't expecting any such payment.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Terry

subject: Re: Attn: - Your Seized COVID-19 Relief Check
body:
INVESTIGATION FBI.WASHINGTON DC..
FBI HEADQUARTERS IN WASHINGTON, D.C.
J.EDGAR HOOVER BUILDING
935 PENNSYLVANIA AVENUE, NW
WASHINGTON, D.C. 20515-0001.
FBI MEMO .

ATTENTION:

Sequel to your email received; One Mr. Jeffery Brooks, private parcel
delivery agent under FedEx was arrested by my officers stationed at the
Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport with an envelop that contain a
bank certified check sum of $250,000.00 USD issued by The Internal Revenue
Service that is said to belong to you as your unreleased May 20th, 2020
COVID-19 Economic Impact Payment. The delivery agent has said to have
confirmed that the money is not a stolen or money laundry fund but I won't
order the release of the parcel without doing the proper investigation and
making sure his claims are true, so I have scheduled a meeting for Monday
11th March at 3 PM with the director U.S. Department of Justice at the desk
of the  Money Laundering and Asset Recovery Section to acquire the stamp
and legal fund certificate of ownership on your behalf and that will cost
you $290.00 usd only.

NOTE: This is the only fee you will ever be asked to take care of
afterwards the delivery agent will be released to complete his delivery to
your country home. You are best advised to send the $290.00 usd between now
till Monday morning before the scheduled time for the meeting, afterwards I
shall release the check to your delivery agent to commence delivery to you
and henceforth nobody will disturb him again for anything, this is all we
are going to be asking for and nothing more.


YOURS FAITHFULLY,

Mr. Christopher Wray
FBI Director
FBI HEADQUARTERS IN WASHINGTON, D.C.
J.EDGAR HOOVER BUILDING
935 PENNSYLVANIA AVENUE, NW
WASHINGTON, D.C. 20515-0001.
FBI MEMO.

subject: Re: Attn: - Your Seized COVID-19 Relief Check
body:
Hello Mr. Wray,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this situation. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear that a check in my name was found with Mr. Jeffery Brooks. 

I'm curious, how did Mr. Brooks come into possession of this check? And why was he trying to deliver it to me? Also, could you please explain more about the Economic Impact Payment you mentioned?

Regarding the payment of USD for acquiring the stamp and legal fund of ownership, could you provide more details on what exactly this fee covers? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Terry
